channel.title: Keybase on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Keybase on tlake.io

item.title: spring cleaning my digital identity
item.description: I’d been reading up about git-secret and realized that I didn’t really grasp what a PGP key is or how to use one (or more). I’ve had a Keybase account since 2011, and it’s become a bit of a disjointed mess.
